column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hakoda says : " Do n't worry , you 'll do great . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Good morning everyone .
#Text=" Sokka says : " ... And then Katara got Haru arrested and then now he 's grown a mustache which if you look at him in the front row you can see it ... " Hakoda says : " Thank you , Sokka .
#Text=It 's okay why do n't you take a break ?
#Text=Let me just clarify a few points for everyone .
#Text=Today , is the day of black sun , and I want to thank you all for your self - sacrifice , and your courage .
#Text=There are two steps to the invasion , a naval stage , and then a land stage .
#Text=To gain sea access to the Fire Nation capital , we need to get past our first major obstacle here , The Great Gates of Azulon .
#Text=Next , we hit the land , and we hit hard .
#Text=We must fight past their battlements and secure the plaza tower .
#Text=Once we do that , it 's up to the Royal Palace .
#Text=At that point , the eclipse will begin .
#Text=" The Boulder says : " Excuse me .
#Text=The Boulder is confused .
#Text=Is n't the point to invade during the eclipse , when the firebenders are powerless ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " The eclipse only lasts eight minutes , not enough time for the whole invasion .
#Text=And the Royal Palace is heavily guarded by firebenders .
#Text=So that 's where we 'll need the eclipse 's advantage the most .
#Text=When this is finished , the Avatar will have defeated the Fire Lord .
#Text=We will have control of the Fire Nation capital , and this war will be over !
#Text="
